name: audiobook-web
description: Audiobook reader web application with text-to-speech

scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:shared"
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web
scripts.deploy:server: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server
scripts.nuclear: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist packages/*/*.tsbuildinfo

author: zhwind
